short_description_localized.en: Set yourself in the middle of grand old Manhattan in this 200-square-foot room with two queen beds on a higher floor of our hotel.
short_description_localized.es: Set yourself in the middle of grand old Manhattan in this 200-square-foot room with two queen beds on a higher floor of our hotel.

description_localized.en: Whether for a family vacation or friends’ getaway, our 200-square-foot room with two queen beds up on a high floor will provide for a comfortable stay. Start with daily continental breakfast and hit the streets—we are close to so many attractions, including the Empire State Building. Max. 4 guests.
